tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE witness_statements (
    witness_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    witness_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    statement_text TEXT,
    case_id UUID,
    date_recorded TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE witness_statements (
	statement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	witness_name VARCHAR(50),
	case_id INT,
	statement_text TEXT,
	date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE evidence_records (
	evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	case_id INT,
tevidence_description TEXT,
	date_collected DATE,
	collected_by VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE cases (
	case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	case_name VARCHAR(100),
	case_description TEXT,
	case_status VARCHAR(20),
	assigned_officer VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE suspects (
	suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	suspect_name VARCHAR(50),
	suspect_alias VARCHAR(50),
	date_of_birth DATE,
	home_address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE crime_scenes (
	scene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location VARCHAR(100),
	date_occurred DATE,
	details TEXT,
	evidence_collected BOOLEAN
)
